channel.title: Will rep for help! Still Unsolved
channel.description: on my server regardless of what items you have equiped your bonuses stay at 120 even if you have nothing equiped instead ob being 0 its 120 if ANY ONE can solve this i will rep them.

item.title: Will rep for help! Still Unsolved
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

[code=java]public void GetBonus() {
for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) {
if (playerEquipment[i] > -1) {
for (int j = 0; j < 9999; j++) {
if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[j] != null){
if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemId == playerEquipment[i]) {
for (int k = 0; k < playerBonus.length; k++) {
playerBonus[k] += server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].Bonuses[k];
}
break;
}
}
}
}
}
}
public void WriteBonus() {
int offset = 0;
String send = “”;
for (int i = 0; i < playerBonus.length; i++) {
if (playerBonus[i] >= 0) {
send = BonusName[i]+": +"+playerBonus[i];
} else {
send = BonusName[i]+": -"+java.lang.Math.abs(playerBonus[i]);
}

		if (i == 10) {
			offset = 1;
		}
		sendFrame126(send, (15113+i+offset));
	}[/code]

Read full topic
